item.description: Over a 20-day period, the several counties in Texas. Things really light up in the counties that countain big cities like Houston, Austin, and Dallas. Based on the CDC dataset, we can see that things get pretty bad, but start to settle down after mid-July…

item.title: Bird Ages
item.description: I wanted to know if there was any signal for how old birds get if theyre closely related. Ultimately, I would love to know how age is affected by size (weight, wingspan, whatever) but I cant find open datasets for that…
